DataElement.preferredName: Generalized Anxiety Disorder 7 Item Questionnaire Last Two Weeks How Often Bothered by Problems Feeling Afraid as if Something Awful Might Happen Frequency Four Point Scale
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A person's stated observation of feeling afraid as if something awful might happen using a four point Likert scale.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Generalized Anxiety Disorder 7 Item Questionnaire Last Two Weeks How Often Bothered by Problems Feeling Afraid as if Something Awful Might Happen
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A seven item validated, self-reported questionnaire for screening, and assessing the severity of generalized anxiety disorder in clinical practice and research settings._Coming after all others in time or space or degree or being the only one remaining._A natural number greater than 1 and less than 3 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of one and one._Any period of seven consecutive days._A question about how often an individual is or was bothered by problems._A question about whether an individual feels or felt afraid as if something awful might happen.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A standardized survey developed by Robert L. Spitzer and colleagues in 2006 which is used to identify probable cases of generalized anxiety disorder and assess the severity of an individual's symptoms. This instrument consists of 7 items and one follow-up item. Each item is rated on a scale of 0-3 where 0 is 'not at all' and 3 is 'nearly every day.'

Concepts.definition: A seven item validated, self-reported questionnaire for screening, and assessing the severity of generalized anxiety disorder in clinical practice and research settings.

Concepts.definition: Coming after all others in time or space or degree or being the only one remaining.
A natural number greater than 1 and less than 3 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of one and one.
Any period of seven consecutive days.
A question about how often an individual is or was bothered by problems.

Concepts.longName: Feeling Afraid as if Something Awful Might Happen
Concepts.definition: A question about whether an individual feels or felt afraid as if something awful might happen.
